controller.ai
Class AIPlayer

java.lang.Object
  controller.ai.AIPlayer

public class AIPlayer
extends java.lang.Object

Class for representing a player. Each AIPlayer will control one enemy. Keeps track of shortest path between the two, current cooldown and how many updates have gone since the enemy was last updated.

Author:
jesperpersson
